name: ANGEL DROID
description:
You are you.
I am a kid.
I built a robot.
I call this robot my Angel Droid.
The Angel Droid was engineered to fight despair itself.
To do this, I fly the Angel Droid around my city to save people.
The Angel Droid is not perfect, so I need to save several people before it's configured properly.
And then I will finally [REDACTED]

What does Angel Droid offer?

  • Lots of spells
  • Lots of surreal environments
  • An addictive gameplay loop
  • Mindless-yet-hectic combat
  • A power fantasy
  • An experience that will [REDACTED]

The First Goal of this Game:

To create a universe with an endless quantity of craftable spells and experimentation. Based on 12 main elements, Angel Droid currently offers 28,000 possible spell configurations. With each element added in future updates, thousands of new spell combinations will become available.

The Second Goal of this Game:

To become a portfolio of music compositions. The music was written first. This video game exists only because the music exists.
